safety_checklist_categories.name: ACCESS TO PROPERTY
items: Is there more than one level on the property?
If I need them, are there working lifts or accessible stairways?
Are any entrances/exits to the property obstructed in any way, or could they pose a risk to safety? Eg, broken/uneven stairs
Is there difficulty with mobile phone reception?
Is there a safe place to park my car?
Is there a working landline (home phone) on the property?
Is there more than 1 entry or exit point to the property?

safety_checklist_categories.name: ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARDS
items: Is there adequate lighting/ventilation inside?
Are there any trip or slip hazards?
Are there any fire hazards?
Are smoke detectors present and maintained?
Do you have all the required equipment to work safely within your home?
Do you have any pets/animals on the property?
Can the animals be put in a room or outside during home visits, if needs be?
Where does the pet go to the toilet?

safety_checklist_categories.name: OCCUPANTS
items: Do you or other occupants in the house smoke inside?
Do you or any other occupants have a known history of physical violence?
Are there any other occupants or visitors who may be present during home visits?
Does the client or any other occupants have use of firearms in the past?

safety_checklist_categories.name: SERVICE DELIVERY
items: Is manual handling required?
Is any equipment in working order?
If medication is administered by ONCALL,?
If so,has an ONCALL medication treatment sheet been completed?
Is medication stored safely?
Any other risks/issues to report?
Do you use communication aides?
Do you use any mobility aides?
If so, is this equipment safe and maintained?
Are there any biological hazards (could the staff come into contact with any body fluids)?
Is there appropriate PPE available for personal care?
